TEXT.TITLE: MAYFAIR <MAYF> IN HERSHEY <HSY> LICENSE DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Mayfair Industries Inc said it has entered into a licensing agreement under which it will use logos of Hershey Foods Inc candy products on a variety of garments, effective immediately. Reuter
